scripts.services:install: npm-run-all --parallel api:install ws:install engine:install mm:install frontend:install tickerWorker:install
scripts.services:dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n 'API,ENGINE,WS,DB-REFRESH,DB-DEV,TICKERWORKER,FRONTEND,MM' -c 'red,green,blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,gray,orange' "cd api && npm run dev" "cd engine && npm run dev" "cd ws && npm run dev" "cd db && npm run refresh:views" "cd db && npm run dev" "cd tickerWorker && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd mm && npm run dev"
